properties.entry: SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PWD , ADMIN_EMAIL , ADMIN_PHONE , ADMIN_STATUS FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ? AND ADMIN_PWD = ? AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM RESERV WHERE RES_STATUS IN('확정', '취소')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT RES_NO , RES_DATE , MID , MEM_ID , PAY_AMOUNT , RES_CHECKIN , RES_STATUS FROM (SELECT MEM_ID MID , RES_NO FROM RESERV JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) ) JOIN RESERV USING(RES_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(RES_NO) JOIN FEE F USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.SITTER_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE RES_STATUS IN('확정', '취소') ORDER BY RES_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT RES_NO , RES_DATE , MID , MEM_ID , PAY_AMOUNT , RES_CHECKIN , RES_STATUS FROM (SELECT MEM_ID MID , RES_NO FROM RESERV JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) ) JOIN RESERV USING(RES_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(RES_NO) JOIN FEE F USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.SITTER_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE RES_STATUS IN('확정', '취소') AND TO_CHAR(RES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = ? ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT SITTER_ID , SITTER_NAME , TO_CHAR(MONTH) "MONTH" , TO_CHAR(YEAR) "YEAR" , TOTAL FROM VW_CAL ORDER BY YEAR, MONTH DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT SITTER_ID , SITTER_NAME , TO_CHAR(MONTH) "MONTH" , TO_CHAR(YEAR) "YEAR" , TOTAL FROM VW_CAL ORDER BY YEAR, MONTH DESC WHERE SITTER_ID LIKE ? ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM (SELECT SITTER_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, ACC_BANK, ACC_NUMBER, RES_CHECKOUT, PAY_NO, PAY_AMOUNT*0.9 AS CONF, RES_STATUS FROM SITTER JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN FEE USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN RESERV USING(RES_NO) WHERE RES_STATUS = '확정' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-dd')) < EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT,'YYYY-MM-dd')) <= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-dd')) = ? AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT,'YYYY-MM-dd')) = ? AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM (SELECT MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, ACC_BANK, ACC_NUMBER, PAY_NO, CANCEL_DATE, (CASE WHEN D > 14 THEN M * 0 WHEN D > 7 THEN M * 0.05 WHEN D > 3 THEN M * 0.25 ELSE M * 0.9 END) AS CANC, D FROM (SELECT MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, ACC_BANK, ACC_NUMBER, PAY_NO, CANCEL_DATE, ROUND(SYSDATE - (TO_DATE(RES_CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-dd')),0) D, PAY_AMOUNT M FROM SITTER JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN FEE USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN RESERV USING(RES_NO) WHERE RES_STATUS = '취소' AND PENALTY = 'N')) WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CANCEL_DATE) = ? AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CANCEL_DATE) = ? AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , ACC_BANK , ACC_NUMBER , TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS DEAL_DATE , PAY_NO , CONF , (CASE WHEN RES_STATUS = '확정' THEN 'N' END) AS ISPENALTY FROM (SELECT SITTER_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, ACC_BANK, ACC_NUMBER, RES_CHECKOUT, PAY_NO, PAY_AMOUNT*0.9 AS CONF, RES_STATUS FROM SITTER JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN FEE USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN RESERV USING(RES_NO) WHERE RES_STATUS = '확정') WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-dd')) = ? AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(RES_CHECKOUT,'YYYY-MM-dd')) = ? AND MEM_ID = ? ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , ACC_BANK , ACC_NUMBER , CANCEL_DATE AS DEAL_DATE , PAY_NO , CANC , (CASE WHEN D > 3 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS ISPENALTY FROM (SELECT MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, ACC_BANK, ACC_NUMBER, PAY_NO, CANCEL_DATE, (CASE WHEN D > 14 THEN M * 0 WHEN D > 7 THEN M * 0.05 WHEN D > 3 THEN M * 0.25 ELSE M * 0.9 END) AS CANC, D FROM (SELECT MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, ACC_BANK, ACC_NUMBER, PAY_NO, CANCEL_DATE, ROUND(SYSDATE - (TO_DATE(RES_CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-dd')),0) D, PAY_AMOUNT M FROM SITTER JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN FEE USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN RESERV USING(RES_NO) WHERE RES_STATUS = '취소' AND PENALTY = 'N')) WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CANCEL_DATE) = ? AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CANCEL_DATE) = ? AND MEM_ID = ? ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT ACC_BANK FROM ACCOUNT JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT ACC_NUMBER FROM ACCOUNT JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ?
